title: Shortly
subtitle: URL Shortener Integration
description: A functional URL shortening application integrated with the Shrtcode API. It allows users to generate short links and manage them within a session.

title: Agile System
subtitle: Project Management Tool
description: A productivity dashboard featuring a Kanban-style workflow. Users can track project progress, manage tasks across columns, and visualize team velocity.

title: Nestlify
subtitle: SaaS Marketing Site
description: A modern marketing website for a business growth platform. It features clean typography, data visualization previews, and a structured layout to convert visitors.

title: Todo Master
subtitle: Productivity App
description: A robust todo application supporting drag-and-drop reordering and theme toggling. It persists data locally to ensure users never lose track of their tasks.

title: Reuben Oluwafemi
subtitle: Personal Portfolio
description: A high-performance personal portfolio showcasing the intersection of engineering logic and creative design, featuring smooth transitions and a unique dark aesthetic.

title: The Marque Hub
subtitle: Talent Agency Platform
description: A refined modeling agency platform designed to connect world-class models with clients. Features a high-fashion minimalist aesthetic to highlight talent portfolios.

title: Sushi Restaurant
subtitle: Landing Page
description: An immersive, dark-themed landing page for a sushi restaurant that emphasizes visual storytelling. Designed to guide customers seamlessly from visual discovery to ordering.

title: DevJobs Board
subtitle: Job Filtering System
description: A dynamic job listing board that filters positions based on tech stacks and seniority. Users can select multiple tags to narrow down the JSON-sourced data.
